name: Spider-Man 3
storyline: Spider-Man 3 like the movie it’s based on as well as the two games that came before it cherry picks plot elements from the source material while expanding the plot and playtime with other Spider-Man villains.
summary: Spider-Man 3 like the movie it’s based on as well as the two games that came before it cherry picks plot elements from the source material while expanding the plot and playtime with other Spider-Man villains.
